title._content: [Captain Joseph W. Winger of Company D, 2nd Pennsylvania Heavy Artillery Regiment in uniform with bayoneted musket, cap box, and cartridge box] (LOC)

description._content: [Captain Joseph W. Winger of Company D, 2nd Pennsylvania Heavy Artillery Regiment in uniform with bayoneted musket, cap box, and cartridge box] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 8.3 x 7 cm. (plate) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Additional information in collections file. Not in case. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: Winger, Joseph W. United States.--Army.--Pennsylvania Heavy Artillery Regiment, 2nd (1862-1866)--People. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Rifles--1860-1870. Bayonets--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27320 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2457
